collection.content:
Drill down to view child items for this parent

Click on a parent item in hierarchical sections to open the list with its child items.

Find more actions for parent content item

Edit title and properties for parent items in Blogs and Lists sections or edit the content of parent items in other hierarchical sections.

content:
Learn how to...

  • Apply templates to pages
  • Add widgets to pages and templates
  • Work with revision history
  • Personalize pages
  • Work with keyboard shortcuts

collection.content:
Change the order and hierarchy of pages

You can reorder pages or change their parent page thus modifying where pages are located within the website navigation. This may also affect their URLs.

Open sidebar to sort and filter pages

Sort pages alphabetically or by date created and date modified. Filter by language and status. Apply custom filters by owner and date range.

Settings for pages

Manage settings for pages, such as permissions, custom fields, or templates. Set the homepage of your website.

Reveal more selection options and bulk actions

Tick one or more checkboxes to view additional options for selecting items and to reveal bulk actions.

Find more actions for pages

Find all available actions for pages, such as edit content, or properties. Additional options are available like creating a child page and duplicating a page.

Switch and manage language versions

Switch between available language versions of the current page. Add new language versions and change their behaviour.

More actions for the current page

Unpublish or schedule the current page for publishing. Additional options are available like permissions, revision history and content location.

Open sidebar to sort and filter content

Sort list items alphabetically or by date created and date modified. Filter by language and status. Apply custom filters by taxonomies, author, and date range.

Settings for current section

Manage settings for content items, such as permissions or custom fields. Access the Recycle bin, if enabled.

Reveal more selection options and bulk actions

Tick one or more checkboxes to view additional options for selecting items and to reveal bulk actions.

Edit and translate content items

Access easily the content items in different languages or add new translation.

Find more actions for each content item

Publish, unpublish or schedule for publishing a content item from the list. Additional options are available like permissions and sending for translation. Access previous versions in revision history. Any item can be duplicated or deleted from the list too.

Go back to the list with all content items

Return to the list with all items anytime. Make sure you save changes of this item first.

Switch language versions

Switch between available language versions of the current item. Compare translations of this content.

Item status, author and date

See the item status - Draft or Published, who the author is, date of creation or publication, and when the last changes were made.

More actions for the current content item

Unpublish or schedule the current item for publishing. Additional options are available like permissions, revision history, content location and analytics (if enabled).

Browse sibling items

No need to go back to the list with all items to open another one. Open the sidebar and switch between content items of the current section. Make sure you save changes of this item first.

Edit the title of your content

Just click on the Title input and start typing.

Edit your text

Just click on the rich text input and start typing.Use the toolbar to format the content.

Go back to the list with all content items

Return to the list with all items anytime. Make sure you save changes of this item first.

Switch language versions

Switch between available language versions of the current item. Compare translations of this content.

Schedule for publishing

No need to publish newly created items right away. Schedule a date when to publish them on the site.

Put a title on your content

Just click on the Title input and start typing.

Create your text

Just click on the rich text input and start typing. Use the toolbar to format the content.

Browse image libraries

Open the sidebar to quickly access and navigate through all image libraries.

Settings for images

Switch between different views for images. Manage settings for thumbnails and more.

Display library options

Select a library to edit its properties, move it to another library or reorder its images.

Sort and filter images

Sort images by date. Filter by language and status. Apply custom filters by category, tag, author, date range, and file extension.

Display bulk actions

Select multiple items to view bulk actions. Select only images to view more actions applicable specifically for them.

Go back to the library

Return to the list with all images. Make sure you save all changes first.

More options for this image

View the original image and all its sizes. Embed or download the image.

Image settings

Crop, resize, or rotate an image. Replace the file or select a different file for the current translation only.

Reorder images

Use drag-and-drop to rearrange images the way you want them displayed on the public site.

Browse document libraries

Open the sidebar to quickly access and navigate through all document libraries.

Sort and filter documents

Sort documents by title and date. Filter by language and status. Apply custom filters by category, tag, author, and date range.

Go back to the library

Return to the list with all documents. Make sure you save all changes first.

More options for this document

Embed or download the document. Additional options are available like permissions, revision history, and document location.

Explore classification items

Click on a classification to view its items.

Usage in sites

See which sites use this classification.

Find more actions

Edit classification properties or define which sites to use it. Additional options are available like permissions and sending for translation.

Order categories

Reorder categories manually the way you want them displayed on the public site.

Display more selection options and bulk actions

Select one or more checkboxes to edit properties or to move items to another category.

Where a category is used

View a list of all categorized content items.

Find more actions

Edit properties, create a child category, and move items to another category.

Display more selection options and bulk actions

Select one or more checkboxes to edit properties in bulk, merge tags, or move items to another tag.

Where a tag is used

View a list of all tagged content items.

Find more actions

Edit properties or move items to another tag.

Browse video libraries

Open the sidebar to quickly access and navigate through all video libraries.

Settings for videos

Switch between different views for videos. Manage permissions and more.

Display library options

Select a library to edit its properties, move it to another library or reorder its videos.

Sort and filter videos

Sort videos by date. Filter by language and status. Apply custom filters by category, tag, author, date range, and file extension.

Display bulk actions

Select multiple items to view bulk actions. Select only videos to view more actions applicable specifically for them.

Go back to the library

Return to the list with all videos. Make sure you save all changes first.

More options for this video

Play, embed or download the video. Additional options are available like permissions, revision history, and video location.

Video settings

Replace the file or select a different file for the current translation only.

Thumbnail options

Capture a video frame or upload a custom image for the current video.

Reorder videos

Use drag-and-drop to rearrange videos the way you want them displayed on the public site.

Sort and filter content blocks

Sort content blocks alphabetically, by date created, оr date modified. Filter by language. Apply custom filters by taxonomies, author, and date range.

Display more selection options and bulk actions

Select multiple items to assign tags and categories in bulk. Select only content blocks to view more actions applicable specifically for them.

Edit and translate content blocks

Easily access the content blocks in different languages or add new translation.

Where a content block is used

View a list of all pages and templates sharing a content block.

Find more actions

Edit or duplicate a content block. Additional options are available like permissions and sending for translation. Access previous versions in revision history.

Go back to the list with all content blocks

Return to the list with all content blocks. Make sure you save all changes first.

Switch language versions

Switch between available language versions of the current item. Compare translations of this content block.

Put a title on your content

Just click on the Title input and start typing.

Create your text

Just click on the rich text input and start typing. Use the toolbar to format the content.

Go back to the list with all content blocks

Return to the list with all content blocks. Make sure you save all changes first.

Switch language versions

Switch between available language versions of the current item. Compare translations of this content block.

Author and date

See the creation date, when the last changes were made, and who the author is.

More actions for this content block

Duplicate or send for translation the current content block. Additional options are available like permissions and revision history.

Browse sibling items

No need to go back to the list with all items to open another one. Open the sidebar and switch between content blocks. Make sure you save changes of this item first.

Edit the title of your content

Just click on the Title input and start typing.

Edit your text

Just click on the rich text input and start typing. Use the toolbar to format the content.
